title: Prohibits landlords from refusing to deal with certain people solely because those people were involved in prior summary proceedings
summary: Prohibits landlords from refusing to deal with certain people solely because those people were involved in prior summary proceedings.

       AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to a tenant blacklist

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 2 of  section  296  of  the  executive  law  is

   13    S 2. Subdivision 3-b of section 296 of the executive law,  as  amended

   18  purpose of inducing a real estate transaction from which any such person
